s: I have been selling on Amazon for a few years now. with a great success. All my offers are FBA. I am the only seller on my ASINs (brand owner with Brand Registry). t: How can I optimize my Brand Store?
Sudden Brand Name REMOVED from Brand Registry
s: We are a long time loyal Amazon seller, but we just got an emailed this morning from Brand Registry case id 13757205111 stating our brand was removed from brand registry without detail explanation, and we dont know what happened/caused the removal · Upon checking with our laywer, it happened ...

No solution has been given to us. ... @Roxana22 I honestly have no clue how to fix our situation. I think I’ve had 4 phone calls with Seller Support, and I send them daily updates on the issue. Below is our product keyword ranking from brand analytics on March 4th (left) and March 5th (right).
